title: Lucene requires ant 1.6?
description:
The latest version in CVS as of April 3rd only builds with ant 1.6.   If this is intentional, BUILD.txt should 
be updated.

Here's the error I get with ant 1.5:

BUILD FAILED
file:/Users/skybrian/remote-cvs/jakarta-lucene/build.xml:11: Unexpected element "tstamp"

comments.content:
Yes, Ant 1.6 is now required (not out of necessity, but moreso for cleanliness).  The Sandbox has 
required Ant 1.6 for a while now, and uses several new features of Ant.

I've just updated and commited the changes to BUILD.txt for Ant 1.6.
comments.author: Erik Hatcher
